div.div: at Forest Grove, Ore. | Hanson Stadium

tr.td: Pacific wins coin toss, defers choice to second half.
George Fox will receive, defending east goal.
Beekman, Alex kickoff 57 yards to the GFU08, Clardy, Caylen return 9 yards to the GFU17 (Iwasaki, Kaiea; Long, Matt).
clock 14:55, Schroeder, Gran at QB for George Fox, Schroeder, Gran pass incomplete to Shaffer, John, dropped pass.
clock 14:51, Shaffer, John rush for 15 yards to the GFU32 (Schwetz, Dalton).
